Welcome to fasterr! This package is designed to optimize existing functions in the Tidyverse package. Let's get started by installing the package.

## Installation

First install the package by running:
```{r setup, eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("sds270-f24/fasterr")
```

Then, to load the package run this command:
```{r}
library(fasterr)
```
